com.appscend.mraid

Class MadvertiseTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appscend.mraid.MadvertiseTracker

  • public class MadvertiseTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Lets you track the access on your app to Madvertise. Use reportAction to report an action. Use getInstance() to retreive an instance of this class.

        public void startNewSession(Context context)
